title: Poached eggs and avocado on toast with tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 onion, finely diced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '200g cherry tomatoes', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons finely sliced fresh basil', 'salt and pepper', '4 eggs', '1 avocado', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 thick slices rye sourdough bread, toasted', 'baby basil leaves, to serve']
